meanings.definition: A gelatinous substance obtained from certain seaweeds, used in the food industry as a thickening agent.
meanings.sent1: The chef added algin to the soup to make it thicker.
meanings.sent2: Seaweed contains algin, which helps in thickening various food products.
meanings.sent3: The algin in the jelly made it wobble like a funny dance.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like algin, thickening the air with joy.
meanings.sent5: The algin in the pudding held it together like magic.
